common.footerText: Files are never uploaded to servers. All conversions are processed locally.

home.heroSubtitle: Convert images, documents, audio, and video files safely in your browser. Your files never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
home.seoDescription: Convert HEIC, WebP, PSD, Excel, M4A and more for free. 100% browser-based, your files are never uploaded to servers.
home.whatIsEasyFileDesc: EasyFile is a 100% browser-based free online file conversion service. Convert iPhone HEIC photos, WebP images, Photoshop PSD files and various other formats to universally compatible JPG and PNG.
home.privacyDesc: All conversions happen in your browser - files are never sent to any server. Convert sensitive documents and personal photos with complete peace of mind.
home.freeDesc: No sign-up, no email verification, no file size limits, no daily conversion limits. Use as much as you want, completely free.
home.noInstallDesc: Just need a web browser. No software installation or registration required - start using immediately.
home.fastDesc: Powered by modern WebAssembly technology for instant conversions without server round-trips.

features.privacyDesc: Files are never sent to servers. All conversions are processed in your browser.
features.fastDesc: Instant conversions powered by WebAssembly technology without server round-trips.
features.freeDesc: No sign-up, no file limits, no watermarks. Use unlimited for free.
features.noInstallDesc: Use directly in your web browser without installing any software.

features.title: EasyFile Image Converter Features
features.secure: Complete Security - Files never leave your device
features.fast: Fast Conversion - Instant processing in browser
features.formats: Various Formats - All major image formats supported

heic.title: HEIC to JPG/PNG
heic.description: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG, PNG
heic.pageDescription: Easily convert HEIC/HEIF photos from iPhone to JPG or PNG. All conversions are processed in your browser for complete privacy.
heic.whatIsDesc: HEIC (High Efficiency Image Container) is an image format introduced by Apple starting from iOS 11. It provides more efficient compression than JPEG, resulting in about 50% smaller file sizes at the same quality. However, Windows and some older software cannot open HEIC files, requiring conversion to JPG or PNG.
heic.error: Error converting HEIC file. Please make sure it's a valid HEIC/HEIF file.

webp.title: WebP to JPG/PNG
webp.description: Convert WebP images to JPG, PNG
webp.pageDescription: Convert WebP images to JPG or PNG. Use them in Photoshop or other editing programs.
webp.whatIsDesc: WebP is a next-generation image format developed by Google to improve website loading speed. It provides about 25-34% smaller file sizes than JPEG while maintaining similar quality.
webp.error: Error converting WebP file. Please make sure it's a valid WebP file.

psd.title: PSD to JPG/PNG
psd.description: Convert Photoshop PSD files to images
psd.pageDescription: Convert Photoshop PSD files to JPG or PNG. Convert PSD files to images without Photoshop.
psd.whatIsDesc: PSD is Adobe Photoshop's native file format. It contains layers, masks, and effects, but cannot be opened with regular image viewers.
psd.error: Error converting PSD file. Please make sure it's a valid PSD file.

tiff.title: TIFF to JPG/PNG
tiff.description: Convert high-resolution TIFF files to JPG, PNG
tiff.pageDescription: Convert high-resolution TIFF files to JPG or PNG. Even large TIFF files convert quickly.
tiff.whatIsDesc: TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) is a format for storing high-quality images, widely used in printing and publishing industries.
tiff.error: Error converting TIFF file. Please make sure it's a valid TIFF file.

svg.title: SVG to PNG
svg.description: Convert SVG vectors to PNG images
svg.pageDescription: Convert SVG vector images to PNG. Preserves transparent backgrounds with high-resolution output.
svg.whatIsDesc: SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) is a vector graphics format that doesn't lose quality when scaled. It's mainly used for logos, icons, and illustrations.
svg.error: Error converting SVG file. Please make sure it's a valid SVG file.

ico.title: ICO to PNG
ico.description: Convert icon files to PNG images
ico.pageDescription: Convert icon (ICO) files to PNG images. Extract favicons or app icons as images.
ico.whatIsDesc: ICO is an icon file format used in Windows. It's used for website favicons and app icons.
ico.error: Error converting ICO file. Please make sure it's a valid ICO file.

document.pageDescription: Convert various document formats. All conversions are processed in your browser for complete privacy.

excel.title: Excel to JSON/CSV
excel.description: Convert Excel files to JSON, CSV, HTML
excel.pageDescription: Convert Excel files to JSON, CSV, or HTML. Easily convert to developer data or web tables.
excel.error: Error converting Excel file. Please make sure it's a valid Excel file.

markdown.title: Markdown to HTML
markdown.pageDescription: Convert Markdown documents to HTML. Convert GitHub README to web pages.

latex.title: LaTeX to Image
latex.description: Convert LaTeX equations to PNG, SVG images
latex.pageDescription: Convert LaTeX equations to PNG or SVG images. Insert formulas into documents or presentations.

media.pageDescription: Convert audio and video files to various formats. All conversions are processed in your browser for complete privacy.
media.ffmpegLoadError: Failed to load FFmpeg. Please refresh the page.

audio.title: M4A to MP3
audio.description: Convert M4A, AAC audio to MP3, WAV
audio.pageDescription: Convert M4A, AAC, WAV audio files to MP3. Convert iPhone voice memos to MP3 for Android playback.
audio.error: Error converting audio. Please check the file format.

video.title: WebM to MP4
video.pageDescription: Convert WebM video to MP4. Convert web recordings to editable format.
video.error: Error converting video. Please check the file format.

gif.title: GIF to MP4
gif.description: Convert animated GIF to MP4 video
gif.pageDescription: Convert large GIFs to MP4 at 1/10 the size. Optimized for social media sharing.
gif.error: Error converting GIF. Please check the file format.

pdf.pageDescription: Convert, merge, split, and edit PDF files. All operations are processed in your browser for complete privacy.
pdf.seoTitle: PDF Tools - Convert, Merge, Split, Edit PDF
pdf.seoDescription: Free online PDF tools. Convert PDF to images, extract text, merge, split, extract pages, delete, reorder, rotate. 100% browser-based for complete privacy.

features.title: EasyFile PDF Tools Features
features.secure: Complete Security - Files never leave your device
features.fast: Fast Processing - Instant processing in browser
features.various: Various Features - Convert, merge, split, edit all supported

toImage.title: PDF to Image
toImage.description: Convert PDF files to JPG, PNG images
toImage.pageDescription: Convert each page of a PDF file to high-quality JPG or PNG images. All conversions are processed in your browser for complete privacy.
toImage.whyDesc: Converting PDF files to images allows you to share on social media, insert into presentations, or edit in image editing software. Each page is converted to an individual image file.
toImage.error: Error converting PDF. Please make sure it's a valid PDF file.

toText.title: PDF to Text
toText.pageDescription: Extract text from PDF files. All conversions are processed in your browser for complete privacy.
toText.whatDesc: Extracting text from PDF files allows you to copy or edit the content. Scanned PDFs (image-based PDFs) may not support text extraction. Works best with text-based PDFs.
toText.error: Error extracting text from PDF. Please make sure it's a valid PDF file.

merge.title: Merge PDF
merge.description: Combine multiple PDF files into one
merge.pageDescription: Combine multiple PDF files into one. Drag to change the order.
merge.mergeOrder: Files will be merged in this order
merge.minTwoFiles: At least 2 PDF files are required to merge.
merge.whatDesc: Combining multiple PDF files into a single PDF. Useful for organizing documents or bundling multiple documents together.
merge.error: Error merging PDFs. Please make sure the files are valid PDFs.

split.title: Split PDF
split.pageDescription: Split a PDF file into multiple files. Split by page or custom ranges.
split.eachPage: Split by page (each page as individual file)
split.invalidRange: Please enter a valid page range.
split.whatDesc: Dividing a single PDF file into multiple smaller PDF files. Useful for extracting specific pages or breaking large documents into manageable sizes.

extract.title: Extract Pages
extract.pageDescription: Select and extract specific pages from PDF to create a new PDF.
extract.whatDesc: Selecting specific pages from a PDF document and saving them as a new PDF file. Useful for sharing only the necessary parts while excluding unnecessary pages.

delete.title: Delete Pages
delete.pageDescription: Select and delete unwanted pages from PDF.
delete.clickToDelete: Click pages to delete. Selected pages will be highlighted in red.
delete.cannotDeleteAll: Cannot delete all pages. At least 1 page must remain.
delete.whatDesc: Removing unwanted pages from a PDF document. Useful for deleting pages with sensitive information or simplifying documents.

reorder.title: Reorder Pages
reorder.pageDescription: Freely change PDF page order using drag and drop.
reorder.dragToReorder: Drag or use buttons to change order
reorder.noChange: Page order has not been changed.
reorder.whatDesc: Rearranging the page order of a PDF document as desired. Useful for changing presentation order or reorganizing documents.

rotate.title: Rotate Pages
rotate.clickToRotate: Click buttons below each page to rotate
rotate.whatDesc: Changing the orientation of pages in a PDF document. Useful for correcting scanned document orientation or changing landscape/portrait orientation.

whyUse.title: Why use EasyFile?
whyUse.free: 100% Free - Unlimited use without sign-up or payment
whyUse.privacy: Complete Privacy - Files never leave your device
whyUse.fast: Fast Conversion - Instant processing in browser
whyUse.highRes: High Resolution - Up to 4x resolution supported
whyUse.batch: Batch Download - Download multiple pages as ZIP
whyUse.output: Various Output - Download TXT or copy to clipboard
whyUse.reorder: Easy Reordering - Easily change file order
whyUse.unlimited: Unlimited Files - No file count limits
whyUse.splitOptions: Various Split Options - Split by page or range
whyUse.visual: Visual Selection - Easy selection with thumbnails
whyUse.multi: Multi-select - Select multiple pages at once
whyUse.safe: Safe Editing - Original files remain unchanged
whyUse.individual: Individual/Batch Rotation - Rotate selected pages only
